It's an epic Chinese war film directed by Peter Ho-Sun Chan and starring Andy Lau, Jet Li, and Takeshi Kaneshiro - a powerful trio of actors. The movie takes place in the 1860s and follows General Qingyun as he joins forces with two bandit leaders to form a loyal army and take on the rebels.
